mapper.sql: id, receipt_order_id, sale_order_id,sale_code, sale_order_amount, receipt_amount, total_receipt_amount, creator_id, creator_enterprise_id, create_time, deleted, modifier_id, modify_time
mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.receipt_order_id AS receiptOrderId, d.sale_order_id AS saleOrderId, d.sale_code AS saleCode, d.sale_order_amount AS saleOrderAmount, d.receipt_amount AS receiptAmount, s.total_receipt_amount AS totalReceiptAmount FROM erp_receipt_order_detail d, erp_sale_order s WHERE 1=1 AND d.sale_order_id = s.id AND d.receipt_order_id = #{receiptOrderId} AND d.deleted = 0 AND s.deleted = 0

select ero.code receiptCode, ero.receipt_time, erod.receipt_amount, ec.name payMethod from erp_receipt_order_detail erod left join erp_receipt_order ero on ero.id = erod.receipt_order_id and ero.deleted = 0 left join erp_code ec on ec.value = ero.pay_method where erod.deleted = 0 and erod.sale_order_id = #{id}
